movies.title: Violette
movies.plot: Violette Leduc, born a bastard at the beginning of last century, meets Simone de Beauvoir in the years after the war in St-Germain-des-Prés. Then begins an intense relationship between the two women that will last throughout their lives, relationship based on the quest for freedom by writing to Violet and conviction for Simone to have in their hands the fate of an extraordinary writer.
movies.simplePlot: Violette Leduc, born a bastard at the beginning of last century, meets Simone de Beauvoir in the years after the war in St-Germain-des-Prés. Then begins an intense relationship between the ...

biography.bio: Emmanuelle Devos was born on May 10, 1964 in Puteaux, Hauts-de-Seine, France. She is an actress, known for Coco Before Chanel (2009), Read My Lips (2001) and Kings & Queen (2004).
biography.name: Emmanuelle Devos

biography.bio: Sandrine Kiberlain was born on February 25, 1968 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France as Sandrine Kiberlajn. She is an actress and director, known for Les femmes du 6e étage (2010), Quand on a 17 ans (2016) and Alias Betty (2001). She was previously married to Vincent Lindon.
biography.name: Sandrine Kiberlain

biography.bio: Grandson of a carpenter, Olivier Gourmet grew up in Mirwart, a Belgian village where his father was a cattle dealer and mother the manager of a family hotel-restaurant. At 13, he was sent to boarding school, which was an unhappy experience that led him to "be closed in on myself". It was at this school that he began acting when he replaced a classmate at short notice in the school play. He discovered a talent for mimicry and comedy. Later he was torn between a career in sports journalism or comedy. He opted for acting and comedy and attended the Conservatoire de Liège where he won first prize after only two years. In 1996 he enjoyed his first significant role in a Dardenne brothers' film, The Promise. Since then Gourmet has featured in every film from the Dardennes. His performance in their film The Son earned him a Cannes Jury prize for interpretation in 2002. He is a much sought after actor with an extensive filmography making, on average five films per year. Internationally regarded as the one of greatest actors with staggering performances in a wide range of roles full of charismatic qualities and insights, he has also received the Critics Award at the Cannes festival in 2011 and in 2012 he was nominated in eleven categories at the Césars! Olivier has been married to Catherine since age 19 and they have two children, Louis and Juliette. After his mother suffered a stroke, the family returned to Mirwart to manage the hotel-restaurant with Olivier's wife leaving her advertising career.
biography.name: Olivier Gourmet

biography.bio: Catherine Hiegel was born on December 10, 1946 in Montreuil, Seine-Saint-Denis, France. She is known for her work on French Twist (1995), Violette (2013) and Méchant garçon (1992).
biography.name: Catherine Hiegel

biography.bio: Jacques Bonnaffé was born on June 22, 1958 in Douai, Nord, France. He is an actor, known for First Name: Carmen (1983), Venus Beauty (1999) and La tourneuse de pages (2006).
biography.name: Jacques Bonnaffé

biography.bio: Olivier Py was born on July 25, 1965 in Grasse, France. He is an actor and assistant director, known for When the Cat's Away (1996), Les yeux fermés (2000) and Corps inflammables (1995).
biography.name: Olivier Py

biography.bio: Nathalie Richard was born on January 6, 1963 in Paris, France. She is an actress, known for Caché (2005), Never Let Me Go (2010) and Young & Beautiful (2013).
biography.name: Nathalie Richard

biography.bio: Stanley Weber was born on July 13, 1986 in Paris, France. He is an actor and producer, known for Not Another Happy Ending (2013), The First Day of the Rest of Your Life (2008) and Sword of Vengeance (2015).
biography.name: Stanley Weber

biography.bio: Jean Toscan is an actor, known for Violette (2013), King of Escape (2009) and Calamity Malik (1996).
biography.name: Jean Toscan

biography.bio: Frans Boyer was born on October 11, 1978 in Guéret, Creuse, France. He is known for his work on District 13: Ultimatum (2009), Point Blank (2010) and Violette (2013).
biography.name: Frans Boyer

biography.bio: Nicole Colchat was born on February 18, 1948 in Ixelles, Belgium as Nicole, Françoise, Christine Roegiers. She is an actress, known for Night and Day (1991), Coda (2012) and Violette (2013).
biography.name: Nicole Colchat

biography.bio: Fabrizio Rongione was born in 1973 in Brussels, Belgium. He is an actor and producer, known for Deux jours, une nuit (2014), The Kid with a Bike (2011) and Rosetta (1999).
biography.name: Fabrizio Rongione

biography.bio: Erwan Creignou is an actor, known for Tout est bon dans le cochon (2012), Violette (2013) and Les braconniers de Belledombre (1997).
biography.name: Erwan Creignou

biography.bio: Vincent Schmitt is an actor, known for Ronin (1998), Dans la maison (2012) and Chouans! (1988).
biography.name: Vincent Schmitt

biography.bio: Jean-Paul Dubois is an actor, known for Forces spéciales (2011), Frantz (2016) and Ça commence par la fin (2010).
biography.name: Jean-Paul Dubois
